title: Game says i abandoned game
body: Okay whenever i go to go lock in my champion it shuns me out of the champ select and it says i abandoned the game,why is it doing this? I click lock in not exit out of the client and whenever someone else goes and leaves the queue it blocks me again, i never leave the game it is always someone else leaving queue or a never i click lock in it thinks I'm trying to leave and decides to move me out. What do i do?

replies.body: Your connection could be unstable, so it can lose sync.  Meaning that the game may have already transitioned to the loading screen and your network is trying to catch up.  You'll want to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tighten up your connection as you transition from champ select to the game.  Let me know if you have any questions.

the connection is fine, reading a constant 30 ping, it doesnt even get to the point where it will show the champions, right as i click lock in my champion there is a 20 second or so countdown to the match where it shows all the enemy champions, it doesnt get that far i click lock in. my internet doesnt go out but yet it just completely locks me out of the game, i never had this problem on my laptop

Regardless of how fine your internet is, it doesn't make you immune from having connection issues with specific servers like champion select.  You can also still have an unstable connection without completely cutting off.  It's really important to go over those steps in the guide to rule out possibilities.  Let me know if that clears things up!
